name: ICONS
description: KITAI is the creator of the superERC721 standard for the Optimism Superchains, enabling seamless NFT interoperability without bridges or wrappers. Through its $ICONS token and Sync Score staking system, exclusive to Zora, KITAI turns community engagement and onchain activity into sustainable rewards. By aligning creators and supporters in a shared economy, KITAI helps fund projects, fosters loyal communities, boosts volume, and delivers tools for collective growth.
